title: +5 LP For Every Player Who Connects When There's A Remake
body:
The reason I'm bringing this up is because I get remake's frequently and it's quite annoying waiting to get into a game just to be let down because someone hasn't connected, I'm only Gold 5, queue timers are about 6 minutes for me, but I know D5+ is around 15+ minutes, imagine waiting 25 minutes to get into a game then having to remake and wait another 25, just a personal opinion, maybe we could reward the ones who did connect, even the ones on the team of the disconnected player, because in 5v5, odds are 50% win or loss. Thanks for your time, I'll be waiting for a reply:) 

 {{champion:202}}

replies.body: it would be abused man thats why you cant do it imagine the higher elo players where the population isn't very big a loss of 20lp and a gain of 45 points in total. will never happen
Very stupid idea. That is basically promoting win trading.
